attributes.action: step down, and make tony blair prime minister again
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Gordon Brown does not have the experience or talent in working with people that Tony Blair evidently had. Mistakes were made during his term of office, but he accomplished so much, that are now forgotten. We want him back! Blairites unite!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
